articles.author: Rounak Jain
articles.title: You might soon be able to send up to 2GB of files on WhatsApp - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. You might soon be able to send up to 2GB of files on WhatsApp  Business Insider India
  2. Wow! WhatsApp media files of up to 2GB can be shared! Check details  HT Tech
  3. WhatsApp allowing users to share media files up to 2GB in beta test:…
articles.content:
Facebook-owned messaging giant WhatsApp is reportedly testing increasing the file size limit on its platform from a meagre 100MB to 2GB as it continues to add new features to compete with Telegram.
… [+2645 chars]
